message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, even exceeding the price in the long run.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly meet somewhere in the middle?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more to me. How about we settle at $18,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand the value you place on the product, I am still not able to meet at $18,000. Would you consider $16,000 as a fair compromise?
